abilities.name: Unwavering Faith
abilities.details: While out of combat, Eris gains [bf]increased movement speed[/]. Upon entering combat with an enemy hero (by dealing or taking damage from them), Eris's next basic attack within a few seconds deals bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly grants her a burst of [bf]tenacity[/].

abilities.name: Flaming Sweep
abilities.details: Eris's next three basic attacks sweeps her fire banner in a wide arc, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies around her.[n]If Eris is within her active <span>Fiery Rally[/] banner's radius, her enhanced basic attacks will deal additional [ap]magical damage[/] based on the target's [hp]current health[/].

abilities.name: Fiery Rally
abilities.details: Eris plants down her <span>Sacred Banner[/] at a target location, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all nearby enemies.[n]The planted banner radiates an aura, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) per second for a few seconds.[n]All allied heroes standing within its radius (including Eris) will be granted bonus [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical power[/].

abilities.name: Zealous Charge
abilities.details: Eris dashes a short distance in a target direction. If Eris lands within the radius of her active <span>Fiery Rally[/] banner, the banner emits a pulse, dealing bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to nearby enemies while also granting her and all allied heroes a [sh]shield[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) for a few seconds.[n]The shield can only be granted once per <span>Fiery Rally[/] banner duration. In addition, casting <span>Fiery Rally[/] resets the cooldowns of <span>Zealous Charge[/].

abilities.name: Holy Conflagration
abilities.details: Eris's <span>Sacred Banner[/] releases a fiery vortex that deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies caught within and greatly [db]slowing[/] them.[n]Casting <span>Holy Conflagration[/] refreshes the duration of her active <span>Fiery Rally[/] banner. However, it will not refresh the ability to grant a shield as it's still counted as a single duration.
